verse.name: v1
verse.lines: For salvation full and free, Purchased once on Calvary, Christ alone shall be my plea—- Jesus! Jesus only.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Jesus only, let me see, Jesus only, none save He, Then my song shall ever be—- Jesus! Jesus only!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He my Guide from day to day, As I journey on life’s way; Close beside Him let me stay—- Jesus! Jesus only.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: May my model ever be Christ the Lord, and none save He, That the world may see in me Jesus! Jesus only.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He shall reign from shore to shore, His the glory evermore—- Heav’n and earth shall bow before Jesus! Jesus only.
